item.title: who is andy?
item.description: Dezhi “Andy” Fang is a graduating Computer Science student at Georgia Tech with concentrations in Information Network and Intelligence. During his 3 years of undergraduate education, Andy has acquired abundant research and work experiences in the fields of HPC, Data Visualization, HCI, and Performance Engineering. Andy is a member of Polo Club of Data Science, where he worked closely with Professor Polo Chau. He produced 4 papers in the intersection of Data Mining and Human-Computer Interaction, and also enjoyed fixing peopleâ€™s Linux and JavaScript problems.
